nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back Coloring Book (1980)
The Empire Strikes Back Coloring Book was a series of children's coloring books published by Kenner in 1980, featuring artwork by Rick Hoberg.

Four of these books were released in that year, with different cover photos and content, but with the same title. Some versions with French titles were released in Canada. A second series was published in 1982.
Featuring R2-D2 on Hoth on the cover, this version was labeled as Item No. 19110.
Featuring Luke Skywalker on Cloud City on the cover, this version was labeled as Item No. 19120.
Featuring Princess Leia, Chewbacca and C-3PO in Cloud City on the cover, this version was labeled as Item No. 19130.
Featuring Lando Calrissian, Princess Leia, Han Solo and Chewbacca in Cloud City on the cover, this version was labeled as Item No. 19140.
